Rulings.HAT:
● Continuous Spell/Trap cards must remain face-up for their effects to be applied. 
If "Mystical Space Typhoon" is chained to this card, you do not search a Beast-Warrior.

PSCT.Vegas:
① When this card is activated: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower Beast-Warrior from your Deck to your hand. 
② All Beast-Warriors you control gain 100 ATK. 
(You can only activate 1 "Fire Formation - Tenki" per turn).
